sub_025_old_m_01:
Hoho! Hello there, child! I am a collector of
curiosities and a great lover of [pknm:1].
sub_025_old_m_02:
I’ve an auspicious curio to offer—if you’ll trade
me [num2:3] [itp1][itm2:2] for it.
sub_025_old_m_03:
[BD06:0]Ah, it seems you haven’t got enough, child.
Why don’t you find some [pknm:1] to\r
battle?\r
You\r
can\r
acquire\r
[itp1][itm2:2]\r
from them.
sub_025_old_m_04:
Hoho! Very good, very good. I feel closer than
ever to [pknm:1] now!
sub_025_old_m_05:
Here’s the curio I promised you. Take good care
of it—it’s laden with blessings.
sub_025_old_m_06:
Wait—I’m afraid you can’t carry any more sets
of Auspicious Armor than you’ve already got.
sub_025_old_f_01:
Ehehe! Hello there, child! I am a collector of
curiosities and a great lover of [pknm:1].
sub_025_old_f_02:
I’ve a curio with a...dark past, shall we say. It’s
yours for [num2:3] [itp1][itm2:2].
sub_025_old_f_03:
[BD06:0]You’ll need more than that, child. If you battle
some [pknm:1], they may drop the\r
[itp1][itm2:2]\r
you need.
sub_025_old_f_04:
Ehehe! That will do nicely. I feel more connected
with [pknm:1] now!
sub_025_old_f_05:
Here’s the curio I promised you. Careful with it—
it’s steeped in a potent malice.
sub_025_old_f_06:
Wait—I’m afraid you can’t carry any more sets
of Malicious Armor than you’ve already got.
